actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution commending the Government of Argentina for its contributions to international efforts to restore peace in the Persian Gulf.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the Government of Argentina should be congratulated for its contribution to the international effort to halt Iraqi aggression, enforce economic sanctions, and restore peace to the Persian Gulf region; and (2) President Menem of Argentina should be commended for taking the initiative to demonstrate support in Latin America for such effort.

titles.title: A resolution commending the Government of Argentina for its contributions to international efforts to restore peace in the Persian Gulf.
